law.catch_line: Biennial report on status of voting equipment and systems.
law.text: Beginning January 1, 1984, the State Board of Elections shall submit a biennial report to the Legislature concerning the status of various voting equipment and voting systems that are in use or are approved for use in this state. This report shall also contain any recommendations by the Secretary of State as to election law modifications relating to the acquisition and use of voting equipment and voting systems.
law.history: Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 360, sec. 10, effective July 15, 1982.
